item.title: C# for Dummies
item.author: pavel.polushkin@gmail.com (Pavel Polushkin)
item.description: install dotnet create app dotnet new console -o myApp run app cd myApp; dotnet run install Visual Studio Code install C# for VIsual Studio Code extension by Microsoft install C# Extensions extension In case of issue add a file omnisharp.json into project root. Now you can debug. omnisharp.json { "MsBuild": { "UseLegacySdkResolver": true } }
